body.name: GRACO SnugRide 35 Lite LX Infant Car Seat (LX/TrueShield, Ion)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 54 mins
features: Adjust handle with one hand, leaving other hand free
Silent Shade canopy easily and quietly adjusts without disturbing baby
InRight LATCH system for a one second LATCH attachment.Do not use bleach
4 position adjustable base lets you customize fit to your vehicle; Engineered and crash tested to meet or exceed US standard FMVSS 213
Easy to read level indicator helps eliminate installation guesswork
body.description: Click! That's the sound of a secure install. The Graco SnugRide SnugLock 35 LX featuring TrueShield Technology has a hassle-free installation using either vehicle seat belt or LATCH. In three easy steps you can feel confident you've got a secure install. TrueShield Technology helps keep your infant safe by providing advanced protection from head to hips in the event of a side impact. The one-hand adjustable handle moves with ease, leaving the other hand free to tend to baby. The Silent Shade canopy adjusts without disturbing baby. Baby will feel safe and cozy with quilted head and body support and the convenient 5-point, front-adjust harness. Click Connect technology provides a secure one-step attachment to all Graco Click Connect strollers making it easy to create a custom travel system that best fits your lifestyle. The SnugRide SnugLock 35 LX featuring TrueShield Technology helps protect rear-facing infants from 4-35 lb and up to 32".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Easy Installation and Use
reviews.reviewText: Stroller and Car seat review—I am a new mom expecting twins. When it comes to basically anything I do a lot of research before I make a final decision. I bought the graco duo glide double stroller back when it was on sale around Black Friday. It was fairly priced and had a lot of good reviews. My husband and I put it together. It was very easy and did not take long at all. We practiced folding it, opening and lifting it in and out of my Mazda CX 5. It just fits sideways in the back of my Mazda. I’m a smaller person and I can honestly say that this stroller is not very heavy and easy to use, I love the storage underneath too.We finally purchased the graco snugride snug lock 35 lx with click connect after narrowing it down to 3 infant graco car seats. We went to a few different stores to be able to see them in person and see how heavy they were going to be. This car seat was definitely the lightest out of all of them. It’s about 9lbs compared to 17pounds or more. The design is very sleek and soft, also it does come with a newborn insert. I also love the safetly harness and it comes with seat belt covers so that they don’t rub against their neck. After doing a little research to see how both car seats snap into the stroller, we got them in. The very front was easy to snap down onto the cup holder tray. The one closest to the back of the stroller was a bit tricky. The arm bar is actually hidden under the cup holder tray. So you have to snap that off and the arm bar is good to go to snap the car seat down on it.Overall I can’t wait to be able to use these items with our twins. I’m very satisfied with the quality so far and the easy installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seatThe attachment is easy to install in the car and not too heavy to move around. The car seat is great and goes with my graco stroller. It adjustable in straps depending on how big your baby gets and is his favorite place to nap on walks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this seat
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with this seat. Have went through 5 car seats due to accident and this was one I would recommend. The color is clean and the cover is made of a waterproof material. Baby fits comfortably and it’s a study seat. Highly recommend especially because it has the click button latch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this car seat
reviews.reviewText: I got this car seat for my first child and loved it so much I bought it for my second child! Super easy installation, easy to take apart to wash and I feel my child is safe. I love the click tight feature, it’s easy to get the car seat in and out of the car and easy to attach to the stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got as a gift for my brother
reviews.reviewText: My brother had a baby, so I got this as a baby shower gift along with an extra base and stroller that all worked together. Him and his wife love the ease of use of the stationary base. Being able to just click the car seat in place and not having to worry about dealing with seatbelts evetime is a life saver they say. They love the way the cushions provide support for the baby. Was the carseat they used to leave the hospital in as well. Seems well built as I waited a good 5 months to write a review to see if they had any issues. None so far so I'm happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for newborns
reviews.reviewText: We bought this after using our old car seat with our previous two kids. I am so glad we did because not only is it extremely easy to install, but it gives the best support for newborns. My little one is two mos old now and I love the padding for the head and the body. One thing that is also awesome is the sun shade cover. It goes very far down so it can be darker for baby to sleep. And it’s a breathable material as well. Overall, we love this car seat. All, and I mean ALL of our baby car seats/strollers are graco brand. You can’t beat the price and quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This car seat I use to have for my first born but for my second born I had gotten Baby tread and I honestly regretted it. It was so hard to take out of its base and to put it in unlike this car seat. This car seat is very easy to install and I do not have difficulty taking out the car seat out of the base. It looks very comfortable for my newborn and it had lots of cushion around it which is something I was looking for. This car seat is exactly what I should have gotten for my second born, but since I was being cheap I got what I paid for. Don’t let the price of this car seat scare you, it is worth it for your little one. I will be using this car seat for my third child with no regrets and knowing she will be protected and cushioned well. I am highly satisfied with this car seat. I would be recommending this to my sister in laws and my sister as well once they decide to have one of their own little ones. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We had a Grace before this and it was much heavier. This seat is light and easy to carry. The support is fantastic and we love the one button handle adjustment. Very excited to use this with baby!
